2024

Oct 29, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Reports Third Quarter 2024 Results, Announces $0.18 Per Share Dividend](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-reports-third-quarter-2024-results)

Revenues of $1.9 billion, net income of $79.1 million Earnings per diluted share of $0.97 Challenging market conditions impact aftermarket sales and overall financial performance Absorption ratio 132.6% Board declares cash dividend of $0.18 per share of Class A and Class B common stock SAN ANTONIO, 

Oct 17, 2024 

[Rush Truck Centers Announces winner of last Peterbilt Model 389 ever produced, $500,000 contribution to Wounded Warrior Project](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-truck-centers-announces-winner-last-peterbilt-model-389)

SAN ANTONIO, Texas, Oct. 17, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc. (NASDAQ: RUSHA and RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America, today announced the winner of their sweepstakes to give away the last and only 2025 Peterbilt Model 389X 

Sep 25, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Conference Call Advisory for Third Quarter 2024 Earnings Results](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-conference-call-advisory-third-quarter-2024)

SAN ANTONIO, Sept. 25, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc., (NASDAQ: RUSHA & RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America will host a conference call to discuss earnings for the third quarter of 2024 on Wednesday, October 30 at 10:00 a.m. 

Jul 31, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Reports Second Quarter 2024 Results, Announces $0.18 per Share Dividend](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-reports-second-quarter-2024-results)

Revenues of $2.0 billion, net income of $78.7 million Earnings per diluted share of $0.97 Challenging market conditions impact aftermarket sales and overall financial performance Absorption ratio 134% Board declares cash dividend of $0.18 per share of Class A and Class B common stock, a 5.9% 

Jul 09, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Conference Call Advisory for Second Quarter 2024 Earnings Results](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-conference-call-advisory-second-quarter-17)

SAN ANTONIO, July 09, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc., (NASDAQ: RUSHA & RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America, will host a conference call to discuss earnings for the second quarter of 2024 on Thursday, August 1 at 10:00 a.m. 

Apr 23, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Reports First Quarter 2024 Results, Announces $0.17 Per Share Dividend](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-reports-first-quarter-2024-results)

Revenues of $1.9 billion, net income of $71.6 million Earnings per diluted share of $0.88 Challenging market conditions impact Class 8 new truck sales and overall financial performance Absorption ratio 130.1% Board declares cash dividend of $0.17 per share of Class A and Class B common stock SAN 

Apr 16, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Conference Call Advisory For First Quarter 2024 Earnings Results](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-conference-call-advisory-first-quarter-2024)

SAN ANTONIO, April 16, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc., (NASDAQ: RUSHA & RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America will host a conference call to discuss earnings for the first quarter of 2024 on Wednesday, April 24, 2024 at 10:00

SAN ANTONIO, March 26, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc. (NASDAQ: RUSHA and RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America, in conjunction with Rush Enterprises Foundation, today announced a special sweepstakes benefiting Wounded Warrior 

Mar 08, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises announces retirements of Michael McRoberts, Chief Operating Officer and Scott Anderson, Senior Vice President of Finance, Insurance and Leasing](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-announces-retirements-michael-mcroberts-chief)

SAN ANTONIO, March 08, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rush Enterprises, Inc. (NASDAQ: RUSHA and RUSHB), which operates the largest network of commercial vehicle dealerships in North America, announced today that Michael McRoberts, Chief Operating Officer and a member of the Board of Directors of the 

Feb 13, 2024 

[Rush Enterprises, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter and Year-End 2023 Results, Announces $0.17 Per Share Dividend](/news-releases/news-release-details/rush-enterprises-inc-reports-fourth-quarter-and-year-end-2023)

Annual revenues of $7.9 billion; net income of $347.1 million Annual earnings per diluted share of $4.15 4th quarter revenues of $2.0 billion; net income of $78.0 million Record high annual revenues driven by strong new truck demand and aftermarket growth Board declares cash dividend of $.17 per
